verses.verse: וַיִּפְשַׁ֤ע <WH6586> vai-yif-Sha' rebelled מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> mo-'Av Then Moab בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, against Israel אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after מ֥וֹת <WH4194> Mot the death אַחְאָֽב׃ <WH256> 'ach-'Av. of Ahab

וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol fell down אֲחַזְיָ֜ה <WH274> 'a-chaz-Yah And Ahaziah בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> be-'Ad through הַשְּׂבָכָ֗ה <WH7639> has-se-va-Chah, through a lattice בַּעֲלִיָּת֛וֹ <WH5944> ba-'a-li-ya-To in his upper chamber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> be-sho-me-Ron that [was] in Samaria וַיָּ֑חַל <WH2470> vai-Ya-chal; and was sick וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach and he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim, messengers וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem to לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> le-Chu Go דִרְשׁ֗וּ <WH1875> dir-Shu, enquire בְּבַ֤עַל be-Va-'al זְבוּב֙ <WH1176> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְר֔וֹן <WH6138> ek-Ron, of Ekron אִם־ <WH518> 'im- whether אֶחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> 'ech-Yeh whether I shall recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <WH2483> me-cho-Li of this disease זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> Zeh. this ס sa-Mek

וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> u-mal-'Ach But the angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> dib-Ber said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֵלִיָּ֣ה <WH452> 'e-li-Yah to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֔י <WH8664> hat-tish-Bi, the Tishbite ק֣וּם <WH6965> kum Arise עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh, go up לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> lik-Rat to meet מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> mal-'a-Chei the messengers מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> sho-me-Ron; of Samaria וְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> ve-dab-Ber and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, about הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> ha-mib-be-Li corruption אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him unto them [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> 'at-Tem you הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <WH1980> ho-le-Chim, [that] ye go לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <WH1875> lid-Rosh to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל be-Va-'al זְב֖וּב <WH1176> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6138> ek-Ron. Ekron

וְלָכֵן֙ <WH3651> ve-la-Chen now therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הַמִּטָּ֞ה <WH4296> ham-mit-Tah from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you עָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> 'a-Li-ta on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> sham in it לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> te-Red Thou shalt not come down מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah at כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for מ֣וֹת <WH4191> Mot but shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut; die וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech departed אֵלִיָּֽה׃ <WH452> 'e-li-Yah. And Elijah

וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu turned back הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> ham-mal-'a-Chim And when the messengers אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> 'e-Lav; to him וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer unto him he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to מַה־ <WH4100> mah- Why זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> zeh unto them Why are ye now שַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <WH7725> shav-Tem. turned back

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him אִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> 'ish a man עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah up לִקְרָאתֵ֗נוּ <WH7125> lik-ra-Te-nu, to meet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer us and said אֵלֵינוּ֮ <WH413> 'e-lei-Nu to us לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> le-Chu Go שׁוּבוּ֮ <WH7725> shu-Vu turn again אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech unto the king אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sha-Lach that sent אֶתְכֶם֒ <WH853> 'et-Chem וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֣ם <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Tem you and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> ha-mib-be-Li corruption אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you שֹׁלֵ֔חַ <WH7971> sho-Le-ach, [that] thou sendest לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <WH1875> lid-Rosh to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל be-Va-'al זְב֖וּב <WH1176> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְר֑וֹן <WH6138> ek-Ron; Ekron לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> La-chen from הַמִּטָּ֞ה <WH4296> ham-mit-Tah from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who עָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> 'a-Li-ta on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> sham in it לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> te-Red come מִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah at כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- but מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot but shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ta-Mut. die

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to מֶ֚ה <WH4100> meh What מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> mish-Pat unto them What manner הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, of man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah [was he] which came up לִקְרַאתְכֶ֑ם <WH7125> lik-rat-Chem; to meet וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber you and told אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem, about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they answered אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> Ba-'al archer שֵׂעָ֔ר <WH8181> se-'Ar, him [He was] an hairy וְאֵז֥וֹר <WH232> ve-'e-Zor with a girdle ע֖וֹר <WH5785> or of leather אָז֣וּר <WH247> 'a-Zur and girt בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> be-ma-te-Nav; about his loins וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar And he said אֵלִיָּ֥ה <WH452> 'e-li-Yah It [is] Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <WH8664> hat-tish-Bi the Tishbite הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- unto him a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim of fifty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shav; with his fifty וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he went up אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold יֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> yo-Shev to him and behold he sat עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh on the top הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, of an hill וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber And he spake אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto him Thou man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech Then the king דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath said רֵֽדָה׃ <WH3381> Re-dah. Come down
